keywords: ['pop ballad', 'moderate tempo', 'female voice', 'live recording over song', 'synth backing', 'simple percussion', 'bass', 'romantic song', 'wheels on concrete sound', 'ambient noises']
caption: This pop ballad features a female voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat in the background. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. A synth plays chords and fills. The sound of wheels on concrete can be heard. The mood of this song is romantic. A live recording sound is overdubbed on this song.
